pullrequest.title: Prevent GUI from jumping around, pixel saving, analysis submission improvements

content.raw: before this gets merged, I want to clarify regarding the splitter handles. You say you've reduced the size of them, but I feel like there is more than 6 pixels of space in Shaun's pictures. Maybe it wasn't the size of the splitter handle that needed shrinking, but some padding around the tab widgets?
content.html: before this gets merged, I want to clarify regarding the splitter handles. You say you've reduced the size of them, but I feel like there is more than 6 pixels of space in Shaun's pictures. Maybe it wasn't the size of the splitter handle that needed shrinking, but some padding around the tab widgets?
